FuncDef: This command specifies route policies that control the handling of outbound routes transmitted to certain peers. Route policies are configured in theconfig>router>policy-optionscontext.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the route policy name (up to 64 characters) or a policy logical expression (up to 255 characters long). Allowed values are any string up to 255 characters long composed of printable, 7-bit ASCII characters. If the string contains special characters (#, $, spaces, and so on), the entire string must be enclosed within double quotes.

Specifies up to 14 route policy names (up to 64 characters each) or a policy logical expression (up to 64 characters long). Allowed values are any string up to 64 characters long composed of printable, 7-bit ASCII characters. If the string contains special characters (#, $, spaces, and so on), the entire string must be enclosed within double quotes.
